name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE v. FIVE-R EXCAVATING, INC., Appellant at 111; COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE v. J & R EQUIPMENT RENTAL CO., INC., Appellant at 112

casebody.head_matter:
384 A.2d 240
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE v. FIVE-R EXCAVATING, INC., Appellant at 111. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE v. J & R EQUIPMENT RENTAL CO., INC., Appellant at 112.

Decided April 7, 1978.

Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
